      Methods in org.strongback.command with parameters of type Controller 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Command Command.reuse(Controller controller, double setpoint)
      Create a command that reuses the automatically running Controller to move toward the specified target using controller's tolerance.
      static Command Command.reuse(Controller controller, double setpoint, double tolerance)
      Create a command that uses the automatically running Controller to move with the specified tolerance of the given target.
      static Command Command.reuse(Controller controller, Runnable initializer)
      Create a command that reuses the automatically running Controller to move toward the specified target using controller's tolerance.
      static Command Command.reuse(double durationInSeconds, Controller controller, double setpoint)
      Create a command that uses the automatically running Controller to move toward the controller's target using the current tolerance, timing out if the command takes longer than durationInSeconds.
      static Command Command.reuse(double durationInSeconds, Controller controller, double setpoint, double tolerance)
      Create a command that uses the automatically running Controller to move toward the controller's target, timing out if the command takes longer than durationInSeconds.

      Constructors in org.strongback.command with parameters of type Controller 
      Constructor and Description
      ControllerCommand(Controller sharedController, Runnable initializer, Requirable... requirements)
      Create a command that uses the given shared and managed controller to move within the controller's tolerance of the target.
      ControllerCommand(double timeoutInSeconds, Controller sharedController, Runnable initializer, Requirable... requirements)
      Create a command that uses the given shared and managed controller to move within the controller's tolerance of the target, timing out if the command takes longer than durationInSeconds.
      UnmanagedControllerCommand(Controller controller, Runnable initializer, Requirable... requirements)
      Create a command that uses the supplied dedicated controller to moves within the tolerance of the target.
      UnmanagedControllerCommand(double timeoutInSeconds, Controller controller, Runnable initializer, Requirable... requirements)
      Create a command that uses the supplied dedicated controller to moves within the tolerance of the target, timing out if the command takes longer than durationInSeconds.

    • Uses of Controller in org.strongback.control

      Subinterfaces of Controller in org.strongback.control 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  PIDController
      A Controller extension for Proportional Integral Differential (PID) controllers with optional support for feed forward.
      interface  TalonController
      A hardware-based Proportional Integral Differential (PID) controller that runs on the Talon SRX motor controller.
      Classes in org.strongback.control that implement Controller 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SoftwarePIDController
      A software-only Proportional Integral Differential (PID) controller with optional support for feed forward.
      Methods in org.strongback.control that return Controller 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Controller Controller.disable()
      Disable this controller to not read inputs, compute errors, and generate outputs when computeOutput() is called.
      Controller Controller.enable()
      Enable this controller so that it does read inputs, compute errors, and generate outputs when computeOutput() is called.
      Controller Controller.reset()
      Reset any error values stored from previous executions.
      Controller Controller.withTarget(double target)
      Sets the target value for this controller.
      Controller Controller.withTolerance(double tolerance)
      Sets the absolute tolerance for this controller.
